name: THORN IN THE FLESH
description:
The thorns in the flesh hurt myself to bleed. 
Loathe my soul and everything about… myself.

It is grown up so fast and spread to all parts of my body.
Even without me realizing it.

Along with all my hatred and desire that currently changed myself.

It turns out to be, we ourselves are like thousands of thorns that slowly kill the soul until it dries up empty.



Thorn in the Flesh is the first episode of The Skeleton Limited Series.

Thorn in the Flesh: a person or thing that repeatedly  annoys you or causes you pain. (Cambridge)
Thorn in the flesh is a phrase of New Testament origin used to describe an annoyance, or trouble in one's life, drawn from Paul the Apostle's use of the phrase in his Second Epistle to the Corinthians 12:7–9 (Wikipedia)

Ref: Historical Anatomies (Christoph Jacob Trew)
Translator: Aini Wilinsen
